procedures.name: Cardiac Catheterization
procedures.notes: Diagnostic catheterization showing 3-vessel CAD. EF 35%. Medical management recommended.

procedures.name: Electrical Cardioversion
procedures.notes: Attempted cardioversion for AFib. Reverted to sinus rhythm but returned to AFib within 48 hours.

procedures.name: Colonoscopy
procedures.notes: Screening colonoscopy. Two small tubular adenomas removed. Repeat in 5 years.

procedures.name: Cystoscopy
procedures.notes: Evaluation for hematuria. Mild BPH changes. No masses.

procedures.name: Stress Echocardiogram
procedures.notes: Pharmacologic stress with dobutamine. Fixed inferior wall defect. No ischemia.

procedures.name: Renal Ultrasound
procedures.notes: Bilateral kidneys small. No hydronephrosis. No stones.

procedures.name: Arterial Blood Gas
procedures.notes: pH 7.38, pCO2 42, pO2 68, HCO3 24. Mild hypoxemia.

procedures.name: Paracentesis
procedures.notes: Diagnostic paracentesis during CHF admission. 500cc removed. Transudative fluid.
